Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-51764 affecting package postfix for versions less than 3.9.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-51764 affecting package postfix for versions less than 3.9.0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package postfix is earlier than 3.9.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-51764
